title: HEXAGRAM 53 DEVELOPMENT
raw_text:
HEXAGRAM 53 DEVELOPMENT

We will look here at one of the collective format pressures, the abstract pressure in the 53rd gate. The thing to recognize about the experiential way, about the abstract way, as in the 41, we are dealing with an
evolutionary process that is exclusively human. When we get over here to the format, it is something that influences every aspect of life. The channel 42/53 is called Maturation. One of the absolute laws so far in
the universe is that everything that begins, ends. Everything that is going through a process, whether we want to see this as linear or cyclical, is what we call maturation: the step by step of going through
something from beginning to end. This is life itself for all of us. It is punctuated by birth and death and there is nothing we can do to escape that. This is the maturation process.

The 53rd gate, Development, is the gate of beginnings. I often tell people that one of the nicest images to keep in mind about the 53rd gate is that this format not only belongs to humans but to all mammals. If
you look at this gate in a mammal, it is the gate of freedom. Don't chain these creatures up. Don't fence them in because this gate of beginnings is the gate of freedom to begin an experience. Without that
freedom, there is no evolutionary progress.

This need for freedom is deep inside of us. Its energy is cyclical and it is the pressure to complete. It is the gate of beginnings but the pressure is, "let's not just start it, let's go all the way and complete it so that we
can mature in this process." Its fuel quality is active. It is full of stress. If you look at the root center, you can see that it is the adrenaline system, biologically. This is a stress hormone. If you look at all nine gates,
there is only one where the word stress is there in its fuel dynamic. This is the most stressful of all gates.

Anyone who carries the 53rd gate and who can't begin something new is loaded with stress energy. These are the kind of people that get into a job and then they want to get out and want to do something new. If
they can't get out to get something new, they build up enormous stress inside of them because they need to be free, like a dog that cannot be chained. If you chain them and don't allow them to begin something
new, they become depressed.

Remember that each of these pressure gates out of the root center that are format pressures can all lead to depression. The depression here is when there is no freedom to begin a process so that one can complete
it. The stress is there until the completion is there.

Above the lines it says: Development as a structured progression that is both steadfast and enduring.
Everything that we know about the abstract process is how difficult it is for the abstract being to actually go through a process from beginning to end.

53.1 Accumulation

The essence of this hexagram is Accumulation. Every beginning comes after something is completed.
What usually happens is that you have two kinds of new beginnings. You have the new beginning after something has been completed-that is a maturation process, that is progression-and you have new things
that begin after you stepped out of something before it is finished. That will always lead to difficulties because the resource, that maturation process, is not being fulfilled. The first line Accumulation, speaks
specifically of this.

Neptune exalted. The dissolution of old forms, but not at the expense of valued components that will be retained and transformed. You can see that very clearly in the white book: The pressure to begin
something new, not from scratch but based on the foundation of the old. This is the essence of development. The essence of development is that if you can start something and finish it, the next thing
you start will even have greater power to be able to go through that process of completion. That leads to

Page 1

the ability to go through the experiential path and truly be of value to humanity by going through that experience from beginning to middle to end, so that we can understand the nature of that experience later.
It can be made sense of. It can be shared with us.

Venus in detriment. Development hampered by criticism and the tendency to withdraw rather than make use of these experiences. You get yourself a job and instead of going through the process of really
finishing what you started, you jump out in the middle. You will be followed by an aura and a wave of criticism and you carry that with you to the next job. Because you are carrying that energy with you, you
are beginning again you are back to square one because you have not developed out of that process. This is the essence of what this hexagram is all about. The essence is: are you mature, or immature? The
maturity lies in beginning and completing. The immaturity lies in beginning and jumping out, beginning and jumping out. The whole abstract field is made up of this dichotomy.

So many people who work with Human Design overlook the obvious. This first line carries with it an obvious mystery. If you have a line that begins with a Neptunian exaltation and you take a look where this
gate and its harmonic gate are in the wheel, you can see that Neptune has not been there for about 100 years, Neptune being an outer planet that has a cycle of 165 year. There is nobody alive in the world that
carries this vibration. Probably some people who may have lived until their 90's carried it. It is very important to understand that this is not active in the world. The only thing that is active in the world is the
other side. We live in a great age of jumping in and out. The foundation is only operating out of one side.
Please remember, if you are looking at any line that carries Pluto, Neptune or Uranus, the chances are that it is not active. It may be active in people who are very old. Or it may be gone entirely.

With Pluto and Neptune, we have long periods of time where the fixing of a line does not exist. This aspect at the beginning is not there. You will not find it in anybody's chart. It is not alive in the world.
This is interesting to think about. We live with the consequences of only having a first line that is ruled in our times by the detriment which means that we are here to jump in and out. That is the experience now.

53.2 Momentum

All second lines are projecting outwards. What this line is projecting outwards is the capacity to begin. It always looks like these people can begin something new, which may or may not be appreciated by those
around them. If you have a partner that has the 53.2, it may look like your partner is always ready to start a new relationship. That is simply because they are projecting out that they are ready for something to
begin. That does not mean that that is so. That is only the field that is being projected out.

This line is called Momentum. Success breeds success. Moon exalted. The protection of early success nurtures further achievement. This is the great line of the paper tiger. You are projecting out that you can
really begin something and therefore you get that opportunity. If you fulfill that, if you can really do it, it will be very easy for you to begin something again. In other words, in this whole process of maturation, if
you can actually do it and get through it, then you can do it the next time; it gets easier and better.

Mars in detriment. A tendency with early success to haste and imprudent action. Both sides are being conditioned by 'if.' There is no guarantee that the projection outwards that one is capable of beginning
will allow one to really begin. You may not have what it takes. It is not about what it takes in the line. It has to do with design; it has to do with the individual and what their particular design is, whether or not
they can do anything with that, or who is in their life and the connection to it.

In the white book, the lunar side: The pressure to start something new based on past success. That past success is the projection outwards that you can begin and if you can really do it, that becomes your
success. "I did it. I really got in there. I really could do it." This provides a great deal of strength.

Page 2

On the other side: The pressure based on success is to be impatient for something new. What happens to these people is that because they have early success, they think that they will always be able to have early
success. Remember that they are a second line. That does not mean that that is true. They may be lucky the first time and after that, they try it 50 more times and it does not work. So it is something to be very
clear about in terms of this Momentum. Everything about the nature of this gate is about being so clear that, yes, it is about initiating experience but it is about initiating an experience that can be fulfilled in
order to have the strength to initiate a new experience. It is a cycle that is being built up and it is always there as a theme.

53.3 Practicality

The third line, the end of the lower trigram, deals with the theme of trial and error. Trial and error is very much in harmony with the whole process of maturation because maturation is basically a trial and error
process, going through one cycle and the next, and learning from your experiences.

It is called Practicality. Moon exalted. In its most natural position, the concentration on avoiding conflict to ensure protection and continued development. Avoiding conflict works in two ways: these are people
that will only begin things when they have harmonic relationships with others. This is a collective stream.
And these are people who will leave and walk out on things because it is not harmonic, in order to start something new and to get away from the conflict. These are the kind of people that, when they are in
something, the moment that there is any kind of tension or conflict pointed towards them or in the environment around them, they want to get out. So they are driven (the Moon which drives us), they are
moved to try to find the right kind of collective force to work with. First to third lines don't know anything about the other side. It is always a surprise. It is always trial and error. It is always full of so-
called mistakes.

In the white book: The pressure to eliminate conflict in order to develop. This means that these people cannot be mature unless they have harmony. This is very important to understand. You have a child with
the 53.3 and you have to recognize right away, that they will not develop unless they are in a harmonious relationship and unless there is harmony in their environment. Otherwise they will not develop properly.
It is a very important theme for these people. The development is about human evolution and the maturation process within the human way. So you can have a lot of disturbed people. Remember, these
format gates carry with them deep depression. This is always a possibility in these gates. It is very important for these children to have harmony around them. When they say that they don't like school
because they don't like the fact that there are a lot of people who are fighting and they are uncomfortable with it, you get them out and put them some place else where they can find harmony because without
harmony they will not develop.

On the other side of this, Mars in detriment. The unconscious provoking of conflict that logically threatens security and development. In the white book: Energy which provokes conflict and threatens
development. This process with Mars is that because it is trial and error, these people can be very provocative. They are ready to begin something but it is just as likely that it is a bond that they will break.
The third lines always have to deal with the conflict theme of others. The exalted has to find a way out of it and the detriment provokes it. One of the things that you find about 53.3's is that they have a genetic
strategy in life which is that, whenever they have enough of anything, they instantly provoke conflict and it gives them a rationale to leave, and they walk out to start something new.

53.4 Assuredness

Page 3

Fourth line, upper trigram. Here we are dealing with being unidirectional. We have the theme of externalization. There is the recognition that there is something else on the other side of the channel. This
is in a collective channel and therefore it is inherently social to begin with. That inherently social nature of this channel is the format of the abstract process. You also have to see that this is the format of crisis
and of belief systems. This is the format of all of the abstract processes. Conflicts in dealings with others are going to be inherent in it.

The fourth line, Assuredness is: The ability to maintain the strength of one's individuality in complex and often awkward situations that ensure continued security and development. You notice that 'security',
'development' and 'protection', these terms are all around this. For the abstract being, their cycle is their well-being. If they cannot go through the cycle, they become unhealthy. They must go through the cycle.
This is their well-being.

In the white book: The pressure to maintain one's individuality in confused beginnings. All beginnings are confused. There is no way of knowing where the beginning will lead to. That is the process. That is the
mystery. It all begins with its level of confusion. This is the gift here, to be able to be all right in that. It is your beginning. It doesn't matter. It is all confused around you. You have that capacity.

The other side, the Venus in detriment: The persistent difficulty with embarrassing or awkward situations where normal emotional reactions may prove detrimental. In the white book: Individual pressure for
beginnings that creates awkward and sometimes embarrassing situations. Think about what that is like when somebody is one- tracked when it has to do with beginnings. They have to start something new.
This can be very uncomfortable and can create all kinds of embarrassing situations. You are in the middle of a dinner and you have guests and all of a sudden you have to start a new chapter in the story that you
are writing and you just get up and walk away. Everybody is waiting for dinner to come and you are off.
You have gone and are into your thing. You have to start it but it can lead to embarrassing situations.

The gift here is the Assuredness. When the guests comes sporting into the room and ask what is going on, there is the assuredness to say, "I had to start this. Sorry." This is the one-tracked need to begin. These
people are very fixed on it. If you see anybody with the 53.4, the one thing for them to recognize is that, because it is about the abstract process which is deeply related to the emotional system, they have to be
very careful in making commitments in relationships. This is a one-tracked mind about beginning things.
The moment that anything will go wrong in the relationship, that onetracked mind will start something new. Be very careful about the nature of your commitments because if you are carrying this kind of
energy, there is this deep drive inside of you to start something new. That can be a new relationship or a new job. You have to be clear about the authority within yourself that is making a decision to commit
yourself to something in order that the energy to be healthy. This is true for the whole gate, but specifically for the fourth line.

53.5 Assertion

As I pointed out to you, the first and the fifth line are unusual due to the aspect that they both have
Neptunian exaltation. In both cases, this exaltation is not functioning because we don't have Neptune around in anybody alive. Actually, that is probably not true because there are a couple of people around
who are over 115 years old. There may be a couple of people that are actually carrying that vibration.
There is a guy in Lebanon who is 135 years old. He must have it. There may be a couple of remnants in the world, but what this is saying is much greater for us. Please remember that it is a format energy of our
evolutionary process.

The fifth line, Assertion, has a very beautiful Neptunian exaltation. It says: The underlying and often psychic recognition of the intrinsic values of development that even in periods of isolation has the

Page 4

assertiveness to maintain direction. Its very power garners continued support even from those who are basically opposed. That is very lovely but it does not exist in the world. It will be wonderful when
Neptune comes there in the next century and brings back this quality to the experiential way.

The other thing is that in this assertion, the way in which the fifth line is projected upon is the Earth in detriment, and not on: The pressure to recognize the value of development and the energy for beginnings,
regardless of circumstances. What we live with in the world is: Where the energy for beginnings attracts the very forces that can abort them. This is a time of the survival of the fittest. You stand up and say, "I
think it is this," and somebody immediately says, "No. I think it is that." This is what we have today and what we had for a long time now as the way in which development is projected upon. Think about what
that has done to our civilization in this era.

In the black book: Earth in detriment. An over-assertiveness that, rather than applied to maintaining support in the face of opposition and isolation, may actually strengthen the opposing forces by its attitude.
This is what we have in the world. This attitude of "I am beginning this and this is the way," and somebody opposes. We immediately have a struggle here, and it is the Earth. This is grounding us now. It
is the way it is supposed to be now. In the global cycle course that I teach, I talk about the longer-term trends that are there for us. This is a time of great genetic diversity. We have been living in an era of great
genetic diversity in which we mix the genetic pools across the planet. V% are having an intellectual diversity that we have never had before. This not being fixed on one way, constantly breaking, jumping in
and out, this is the part of the consciousness of the total field now because this is a format energy and they are so important.

Please understand that the way we experience abstract people today is not the way they really are.
Abstract people get a bad press in this time because the fact of the matter is that these two Neptunian aspects that are veiled are not there. They create an imbalance.

The channel 42/53 says: A design of balanced development. We are in an imbalanced time. We are off- kilter. We are out of balance on purpose. After all, that is the plan. This is time for us to be out of balance,
so it is very important to see that, as we move into the next Neptunian cycle that affects this, we will come back into a time balance and thus, those people who work in Human Design in the next century will
have a totally different way of looking at, for example, the nature of the abstract experience because there is a different foundation. There will be a balanced foundation and there will be balanced way in which it
is projected upon from the outside.

Format energies have enormous influence. You can be somebody who is totally individual in your design, and you have the 53rd gate. This gate rules you because it is a format energy. It will insist on that format
being followed and, instead of you pulsing along the way you should, your individuality works in cycles.
This is: you are not individual, you are very individual and it ends. It does not follow the normal format.

Formats have enormous power, so here in this format is our evolutionary way. We are in an experiential way that is out of balance now. That is not a matter of good or bad. That is just mechanically-speaking.
We are on this side only. If individuals have the logic format, they get very fixed on their habits. They get fixed on repeating something as an individual. Often that is very artistic: the individual expression loaded
with the capacity to repeat and focus. Thus you have a lot of composers or painters. A lot of creativity comes out of that because there is the discipline in the focus to stay with an individual process. The
format dictates the way in which the frequency will work. It will not block the individuality.

53.6 Phasing

Page 5

When you look at the sixth line, you see Pluto in detriment which means that we will not experience that either. It does not exist. The 'Department of Planning' always does a good job. You can look at the nature
of this hexagram as a format energy to start the experiential way and you see that Neptune is suddenly there. It takes always the exalted in the first and fifth line that turns this beginning process into something
that is designed to jump in and out. When you get to the sixth line, the line of transition, it says, "How can
I get through the whole process?" Remember that this is what a sixth line truly wants to see: "I begin, and not only do I complete it, I go through the whole thing. I get the fantasy, the feeling, the crisis, the
change. I get the philosophy from it. I get the experience and share it in being the prodigal." The sixth line in this format is not ready to make any kind of commitment until it really can see that it can complete
things, despite Neptune in the first and fifth line.

You can see that Pluto is: The pressure to hide beginnings in fear of losing past support. The one thing we don't need at this time is somebody who can actually complete things and hides that because everybody
else is jumping in and out. We need those examples. If you look at the 10.6, The Role model, you are looking at this sixth line where there is the need to fulfill this.

With the Moon exalted, it is: The energy to attract support for beginnings based on the success of the past.
Only very few of these people who carry the sixth line will begin anything. All they see around them is beginning and jumping out. If they are fortunate enough in their own design to have this sixth line and
they are able to begin and complete something, then they have enormous power. Not only can things be begun and completed but that, by its very nature, attracts all these people. Just because Neptune has not
activated those two parts in our time does not mean that this collective field does not want to be mature. It does. It is the mechanics that is affecting the maturity. The sixth line is saying, "Yes, we can do it. If I can
do that, you will be attracted to me and if you are attracted to me, we can do it together."

Of course, because the theme is so strongly in the jumping in and out, it is not easy for these people to have that ability to go through, nor is it easy for them to meet the others that will allow them to see that it
is possible to begin and end something with them. Remember that there is no 42 here. There is just the 53 saying, "Yes, I can begin things, but can it really be completed?"

In the black book: Moon exalted. The successful utilization of the completion of a stage in development, that by its evident success and value can be used as an example to attract support for the next stage. This
remains a very important aspect and the 'Department of Planning', the gods, is very kind because they make sure that that mutative possibility, the transitional possibility of this sixth line, is only focused in
one direction. It is placed in the direction of really attracting others to complete processes and really be mature. It has taken away what would have added to the strength of the Neptunian side not being there. It
takes away the natural collective sociability of the people who have this gift to share and offer it and turns them into secretive forces. If you look at the history of the world and how it moves, you will see if you
look at the Plutonic movement to this line, times in which so many things were deeply kept secret.

You can see that the theme in the third line is conflict. It is about learning about people. If the sixth line has learned its lesson about the others, it will find the right support from others despite the other energies
that are at work, where maturation can still take place.

Page 6
